paper: Q-FSRU_ Quantum-Augmented Frequency-Spectral Fusion for Medical Visual Question Answering

differences.summary: Retrieval query feature mismatch across sections
differences.why_impacts_score: adds confusion about retrieval pipeline, harms reproducibility and trust

evidence.baseline_quote: Section 4.5.1 concatenates [t_freq | v_freq | k_agg] but Section 4.5.2 excludes k_agg; direct contradiction.
evidence.final_quote: Retrieval query features differ: q_multi = 0.5(t_enhanced+v_enhanced) vs QuantumRAG(t_freq, v_freq); mismatch obscures interaction.

differences.summary: Visual axes inconsistent with described 1D FFT
differences.why_impacts_score: suggests inconsistency between method and evidence, undermines credibility

evidence.baseline_quote: Figure 2 shows spectrograms, but no quantitative assessment of frequency bands is provided.
evidence.final_quote: Visualization axes do not match 256-d 1D FFT, raising consistency concerns between method and visuals.

differences.why_impacts_score: weakens validity and interpretability of cross-dataset results

evidence.baseline_quote: Zero-shot transfer reports accuracy without explaining label-space mapping or normalization.
evidence.final_quote: PathVQA → VQA-RAD result reported, but training regime for reverse transfer is unspecified.

differences.summary: Missing text augmentation details for contrastive training (t_aug)
differences.why_impacts_score: unclear training details reduce fairness and replicability of comparisons

evidence.baseline_quote: Baselines’ hyperparameters, compute budgets, and adaptation procedures are not detailed.
evidence.final_quote: Contrastive training references t_aug, but no text augmentation strategy is described.

differences.summary: Qualitative text-spectrum visuals mismatch preprocessing limits
differences.why_impacts_score: casts doubt on interpretability evidence and data handling fidelity

evidence.baseline_quote: No retrieved passages, attention maps, or case studies are shown.
evidence.final_quote: Text spectrum shows lengths up to 120, while preprocessing caps questions at 50 tokens.

differences.why_impacts_score: technical error in similarity measure can affect retrieval calibration and validity

evidence.baseline_quote: Fidelity computation is precisely stated; this matters for rigor.
evidence.final_quote: Section 4.4.2 states 0 < Fid(ρ1, ρ2) < 1; fidelity should be in [0, 1].
